events.name: Bankrupt
events.narrativeDescription: You lost everything. Credits, possessions, dignity. But you survived, and learned to thrive with nothing.
events.specialAbility: Use Survival skill to sustain yourself in urban or civilized environments

mechanicalEffect.description: As a result of being nearly impoverished, you can use the Survival Skill to sustain yourself in urban or civilized environments.

events.name: Conspiracy
events.narrativeDescription: You uncovered a dark secret. Someone powerful wanted you silenced. You survived, but you'll never stop looking over your shoulder.
events.specialAbility: Reroll Perception checks to Sense Deception or Sense Influence (keep better result)

mechanicalEffect.description: You can reroll any Perception check made to Sense Deception or Sense Influence, keeping the better result.

events.name: Crippled
events.narrativeDescription: An injury changed you forever. Your body bears the scars, but your spirit remains unbroken.
events.specialAbility: Your Damage Threshold ignores Condition Track penalties to Fortitude Defense

mechanicalEffect.description: When your Fortitude Defense is reduced as a result of moving down the Condition Track, your Damage Threshold remains the same, as if you had no debilitating Conditions.

events.name: Disgraced
events.narrativeDescription: Your name was dragged through the mud. Scandal ruined you. Now you wear masks, both literal and figurative.
events.specialAbility: Creating Deceptive Appearance for yourself is one step simpler

mechanicalEffect.description: You treat any attempt to create a Deceptive Appearance for yourself as one step simpler.

events.name: Enslaved
events.narrativeDescription: You wore chains once. The memory burns. Now you fight for freedom‚Äîyours and others'.

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Grapple checks.

events.name: Exiled
events.narrativeDescription: You were cast out. Banished from your home, you learned to navigate the stars and find your way in the galaxy.
events.specialAbility: Plot hyperspace course in half the time (30 seconds/5 rounds). Gain Skill Focus (Knowledge [Galactic Lore])

mechanicalEffect.description: You can plot a safe course for Hyperspace travel in half the time it normally takes (you can plot a course in 30 seconds, or 5 rounds). You gain Skill Focus (Knowledge [Galactic Lore]).

events.name: Imprisoned
events.narrativeDescription: You did time. Prison taught you who to talk to, how to get what you need, and how to escape when necessary.
events.specialAbility: Obtain Black Market goods in half the time (minimum 1 day)

mechanicalEffect.description: You can obtain Black Market goods in half the time it usually takes to obtain (minimum 1 day).

events.name: Marooned
events.narrativeDescription: Stranded. Alone. You survived on a barren world with nothing but your wits and will to live.
events.specialAbility: No penalty to Treat Injury checks to administer First Aid to yourself (or Mechanics for Droids)

mechanicalEffect.description: You take no penalty to Treat Injury checks made to administer First Aid to yourself (or to Mechanics checks made to Repair yourself, if you are a Droid).

events.name: Orphaned
events.narrativeDescription: You grew up alone. No family, no inheritance. Just you against the galaxy. It made you adaptable.
events.specialAbility: When spending Force Point on untrained skill check, add extra +1d6

mechanicalEffect.description: When you spend a Force Point to add to a Skill Check in an Untrained Skill, add an extra +1d6 to the Skill Check.

events.name: Scarred
events.narrativeDescription: Your body bears the marks of survival. One look and others know‚Äîyou've been through hell and came out the other side.
events.specialAbility: Always have Favorable Circumstances when using Persuasion to Intimidate

mechanicalEffect.description: When you make a Persuasion check to Intimidate a creature, you always have Favorable Circumstances.

events.name: Widowed
events.narrativeDescription: You loved and lost. The pain taught you patience, the kind that comes from searching for answers that may never come.
events.specialAbility: Can Take 20 on Gather Information (takes 20x as long)

mechanicalEffect.description: You can Take 20 on Gather Information checks, but it takes 20 times as long as normal to gain the information.

occupations.name: Academic
occupations.narrativeDescription: You dedicated your life to learning. Libraries, universities, research. Knowledge is your weapon.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Knowledge (Any), Persuasion, and Use Computer.

occupations.name: Celebrity
occupations.narrativeDescription: You were famous. Holonet broadcasts, adoring fans, wealth. Whether you miss it or fled from it, everyone knows your face.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Deception, Gather Information, and Persuasion.

occupations.name: Criminal
occupations.narrativeDescription: You know the underworld. The black markets, the safe houses, the codes. The law wanted you. Maybe it still does.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Deception, Gather Information, and Stealth.

occupations.name: Executive
occupations.narrativeDescription: You climbed the corporate ladder. Boardrooms, power plays, bottom lines. You know how to lead and how to win.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Initiative, Persuasion, and Use Computer.

occupations.name: Labor
occupations.narrativeDescription: You toiled. Mines, construction, cargo hauling. Your body is your tool, hardened by years of backbreaking work.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Climb, Endurance, and Jump.

occupations.name: Law Enforcement
occupations.narrativeDescription: You wore a badge. Served the law. Chased criminals through back alleys and bureaucratic red tape.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Acrobatics, Gather Information, and Knowledge (Bureaucracy).

occupations.name: Medical
occupations.narrativeDescription: You healed the sick and wounded. Hospitals, battlefield triage, research labs. Life and death were your constant companions.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Knowledge (Life Sciences), Treat Injury, and Use Computer.

occupations.name: Military
occupations.narrativeDescription: You served. Followed orders. Saw combat. The discipline, the brotherhood, the horror‚Äîit shaped you.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Endurance, Ride, and Treat Injury.

occupations.name: Pilot
occupations.narrativeDescription: The cockpit is your home. The stars are your highway. Freedom means having thrust under your boots.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Knowledge (Galactic Lore), Mechanics, and Use Computer.

occupations.name: Politics
occupations.narrativeDescription: You navigated the corridors of power. Diplomacy, negotiation, manipulation. Words are your weapons.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Deception, Gather Information, and Persuasion.

occupations.name: Technology
occupations.narrativeDescription: You understand machines. Code, circuits, engines. While others see technology, you see solutions.
occupations.specialAbility: +2 competence bonus to untrained skill checks with relevant skills

mechanicalEffect.description: You gain a +2 competence bonus to Untrained Skill Checks with Knowledge (Technology), Mechanics, and Use Computer.

planets_core.name: Alderaan Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: You grew up on the jewel of the Core Worlds. Art, culture, diplomacy. You carry Alderaan's legacy.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain High Galactic language.

planets_core.name: Bakura Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Bakura‚Äîa frontier world of technology and tradition, far from the Core's politics.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain High Galactic language.

planets_core.name: Bespin Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: You were raised among the clouds. Mining colonies, floating cities, endless skies.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bocce language.

planets_core.name: Bothawui Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Bothawui taught you the value of information. Spies, networks, secrets‚Äîthe currency of survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bothese language.

planets_core.name: Cerea Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Cerea's forests and traditions shaped you. Balance, harmony with nature, quiet strength.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Cerean language.

planets_core.name: Corellia Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Corellia breeds pilots, smugglers, and rogues. Independence is in your blood.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Old Corellian language.

planets_core.name: Coruscant Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: The city-world shaped you. Billions of beings, endless politics, and secrets in every shadow.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain High Galactic language.

planets_core.name: Dorin Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Dorin's harsh atmosphere forged your endurance. You learned to survive where others would suffocate.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Kel Dor language.

planets_core.name: Duro Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Duro, birthplace of star travel. Technology and exploration are your heritage.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Durese language.

planets_core.name: Fondor Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Fondor's shipyards raised you among the machinery of war. You understand starships like few others.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bocce language.

planets_core.name: Gamorr Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Gamorr's brutal culture hardened you. Strength, survival, and fierce loyalty.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Gamorrean language.

planets_core.name: Iridonia Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Iridonia's harsh world breeds warriors. You learned discipline, endurance, and the will to overcome.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Zabrak language.

planets_core.name: Ithor Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Ithor's floating cities above untouched jungles taught you reverence for life and nature's balance.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Ithorese language.

planets_core.name: Kashyyyk Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: You were raised among the wroshyr trees of Kashyyyk. Honor, strength, and loyalty define you.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Shyriiwook language.

planets_core.name: Mon Calamari Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Mon Calamari's oceans and shipyards shaped you. Engineering brilliance and aquatic grace.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Mon Calamarian or Quarrenese language.

planets_core.name: Naboo Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Naboo's beauty and culture taught you diplomacy and grace. You walk between worlds‚Äîcity and swamp, human and Gungan.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Gunganese language.

planets_core.name: Nar Shaddaa Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: The Smuggler's Moon taught you hard lessons. Trust no one. Watch your back. Opportunity hides in the shadows.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Huttese language.

planets_core.name: Rodia Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Rodia's jungles and bounty hunter culture made you a survivor. Hunt or be hunted.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Rodese language.

planets_core.name: Ryloth Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Ryloth's twilight world taught you adaptability. Light and dark, heat and cold, freedom and oppression.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Ryl language.

planets_core.name: Socorro Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Socorro's deserts and pirate culture made you tough. Survival means knowing when to fight and when to run.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Socorran language.

planets_core.name: Sullust Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Sullust's volcanic tunnels and tech industry shaped you. Navigation, engineering, and underground resilience.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Sullustese language.

planets_core.name: Taris Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Taris‚Äîonce great, now fallen. You learned to navigate ruins, gangs, and the struggle for survival in a broken world.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Sy Bisti language.

planets_core.name: Tatooine Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Twin suns. Endless sand. You learned that water is life, and survival means being tougher than the desert.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Jawa Trade Language.

planets_core.name: Trandosha Origin
planets_core.narrativeDescription: Trandosha's hunting culture forged you. Strength, endurance, and the thrill of the hunt.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Dosh language.

planets_homebrew.name: Adamastor Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Adamastor's oceans taught you technology, medicine, and aquatic survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Selkath language.

planets_homebrew.name: Adumar Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Adumar's honor-bound warrior culture and manufacturing prowess shaped your technical and social skills.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bocce language.

planets_homebrew.name: Ajan Kloss Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Ajan Kloss's dense jungles and hidden Resistance bases taught you wilderness survival and agility.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bocce language.

planets_homebrew.name: Alpheridies Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Alpheridies, homeworld of the Miraluka. You learned to see beyond sight.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Miralukese language.

planets_homebrew.name: Altiria/Anarris Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: The twin ocean worlds taught you science, diplomacy, and aquatic mastery.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Altirish or Anarrese language.

planets_homebrew.name: Alzoc III Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Alzoc III's frozen wastes taught you to repair, ride, and heal in the harshest conditions.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Talz language.

planets_homebrew.name: Anaxes Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Anaxes, fortress world and naval academy. Military discipline and technological prowess.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain High Galactic language.

planets_homebrew.name: Cathar Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Cathar's proud warriors taught you stealth, survival, and the hunter's instinct.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Catharese language.

planets_homebrew.name: Charros IV Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Charros IV's Xi Char droid engineers taught you precision, mechanics, and keen perception.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Xi Char language.

planets_homebrew.name: Clak'dor VII Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Clak'dor VII, homeworld of the Bith. Music, science, and technology in harmony.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bith language.

planets_homebrew.name: Commenor Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Commenor's trade routes taught you negotiation, technology, and mechanical expertise.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bocce language.

planets_homebrew.name: Csilla Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Csilla's frozen wastes and Chiss society taught you endurance, information gathering, and sociology.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Cheunh language.

planets_homebrew.name: Dathomir Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Dathomir's witches and rancors taught you agility, beast-riding, and survival in a dark world.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Paecian language.

planets_homebrew.name: Dromund Kaas Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Dromund Kaas, ancient Sith capital. Deception, bureaucracy, and dark history.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain High Galactic language.

planets_homebrew.name: Ebruchi Fleet Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Raised among the nomadic Ebruchi fleet. Deception, mechanics, and persuasion are your tools.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Ebruchese language.

planets_homebrew.name: Empress Teta Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Empress Teta's ancient cities and dark history taught you to climb, gather information, and know the galaxy's secrets.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain High Galactic language.

planets_homebrew.name: Hoth Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Hoth's frozen wasteland made you tough. Endurance, beast-riding, and survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Skel language.

planets_homebrew.name: Kalee Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Kalee's warrior culture forged you. Climb, endure, survive.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Kaleesh language.

planets_homebrew.name: Kamino Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Kamino's cloning facilities taught you life sciences, technology, and healing.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Kaminoan language.

planets_homebrew.name: Klatooine Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Klatooine's deserts and Hutt servitude taught you endurance, riding, and survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Huttese language.

planets_homebrew.name: Korriban Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Korriban, cradle of the Sith. Deception, ancient knowledge, and harsh survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Sith language.

planets_homebrew.name: Kuat Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Kuat's massive shipyards taught you technology, mechanics, and computer systems.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain High Galactic language.

planets_homebrew.name: Malastare Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Malastare's podracing culture and diverse population taught you physical prowess.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Dug or Gran language.

planets_homebrew.name: Manaan Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Manaan's ocean world and kolto production taught you bureaucracy, swimming, and medicine.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Selkath language.

planets_homebrew.name: Mustafar Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Mustafar's lava flows and mining operations taught you agility, beast-riding, and survival in hell.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Mustafarian language.

planets_homebrew.name: Muunilinst Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Muunilinst's banking clans taught you bureaucracy, technology, and computer systems.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Muun or Ancient Muun language.

planets_homebrew.name: Mygeeto Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Mygeeto's crystal mines taught you climbing, physical sciences, and survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Muun, Ancient Muun, or Lurmese language.

planets_homebrew.name: Onderon Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Onderon's walled cities and beast-riders taught you climbing, riding, and survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Onderonian language.

planets_homebrew.name: Ord Mantell Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Ord Mantell's junkyards and criminal underworld taught you climbing, information gathering, and galactic lore.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bocce language.

planets_homebrew.name: Skako Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Skako's Techno Union facilities taught you technology, mechanics, and computer systems.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Skakoform and Skakoverbal language.

planets_homebrew.name: Starkiller Base Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Raised on a weapon disguised as a planet. Cold efficiency, science, and technology.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Military Sign language.

planets_homebrew.name: Utapau Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Utapau's sinkholes and beast-riders taught you climbing, bureaucracy, and riding.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Utapese language.

planets_homebrew.name: Xagobah Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Xagobah's fungal forests taught you climbing, life sciences, and survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Xamstan language.

planets_homebrew.name: Yavin 4 Origin
planets_homebrew.narrativeDescription: Yavin 4's jungles and Massassi temples taught you climbing, stealth, and survival.

mechanicalEffect.description: Add two skills from the relevant list to your class skills and gain Bocce or Sith language.
